programme.title: Everyday Food
programme.desc: Astro brings you a new show that shows you a wide selection of healthy And simple meals you can make at home. Thirteen employees from various industries, who are concerned about healthy eating, share their healthy habits. As they prepare dishes, nutritionists And doctors provide professional diet advice on the food they are making. The show also shares some useful crafts And secrets to balancing the body And mind.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: The big day is here! Follow JJ on his first-ever day of school, from riding the bus to meeting new friends in the classroom.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its song and dance time! Join JJ, his friends and family celebrating lifes big moments for little kids. Come along and be part of their fun everyday adventures.

programme.title: Meekah
programme.desc: Its a dino-sized playtime! Meekah travels to a land of dinosaurs, where she meets a T-Rex and plays fun games in a prehistoric world.

programme.title: Blippi
programme.desc: Join Blippi for a fun day of farms and ranches! First, he spends the day at the Axe familys ranch! After getting a behind-the-scenes look at how the ranch is run, Blippi gets to ride a horse and even drive a quad bike! Then, he visits Tanaka Farm and goes fruit and vegetable picking. He even gets to meet some super cute animals! Finally, Blippi finds some potatoes and shows you how to make some funny potato heads!

programme.title: Blippi
programme.desc: How does a recycling truck work? What happens on a farm? Will this object Sink or Float? Blippi explores the world around us with silly dance moves, fun songs, and awesome adventures. There is so much to learn about, it will make you want to shout BLIPPI!

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Follow Baby John through his busy day! From waking up in the morning to playing with his family, every moment is a brand new adventure of discovery.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Its Little Angel! Where baby John, his brother, Jack, and sister, Jill inspire kids and families to have fun and to grow and learn through play. Come sing along!

programme.title: Air Asia Buds Adventures
programme.desc: Its time for a high-flying adventure with the Air Asia Buds! Join them as they explore a busy fire station, visit a fun-filled farm, and learn all about amazing animals. Their journey takes them to incredible destinations around the world, from the vibrant streets of Bangkok and the beautiful beaches of the Philippines to the bustling city of Kuala Lumpur. Its a non-stop trip full of fun, learning, and discovery.

programme.title: VeeFriends
programme.desc: The VeeFriends are ready for some friendly competition! The action starts with an exciting egg and spoon race that tests everyones balance and speed. The challenges continue with an intense staring contest, a hilarious water balloon fight, and a strategic game of hide-and-seek. From bubble-blowing contests to seeing who can be the quietest, its a day packed with fun-filled battles where the only goal is to have a great time with friends.

programme.title: Mias Magic Playground
programme.desc: After a race between snails and a monster truck, the friends learn to put down their tablets, turn cleaning into a game, and work together on a big show.

programme.title: Mias Magic Playground
programme.desc: The gang tries to cheer up a bored Oskar, but their day of fun leads to a mysterious disappearance, a lost tooth, and a run-in with some bullies.

programme.title: Blippi

programme.title: Meekah
programme.desc: Meekah is in the kitchen, making some delicious sweet treats! She learns how to bake ice cream cone cupcakes and other yummy desserts.

programme.title: Meekah
programme.desc: From the rails to the stars! Meekah learns about the power of trains and then blasts off on an adventure to learn about space rockets.

programme.title: T-Rex Ranch
programme.desc: A day of high-tech chaos with an invisibility cloak and hologram projector is followed by an important lesson on washing hands and getting rid of germs.

programme.title: T-Rex Ranch
programme.desc: T-Rex Ranch brings you another awesome fun-packed collection of Jurassic dinosaur videos ! Watch your favorite park rangers get into all sorts of wonderful adventures, coming across lots of scary dinosaurs, awesome toys and much more!

programme.title: T-Rex Ranch
programme.desc: After a treasure hunt leads to a dangerous encounter with a Dilophosaurus, the ranchers must then take on the risky mission of scanning a T-Rex.

programme.title: Supa Strikas
programme.desc: Journey through the world of soccer like you have never seen before! Supa Strikas quest for Super League glory takes them everywhere and anywhere you can imagine. Their skills and determination get them out of the trickiest of situations.

programme.title: Oddbods
programme.desc: An artistic rivalry between Jeff and Pogo escalates, while Zee strikes oil and Fuse tries to cure his infamous temper, creating comical chaos.

programme.title: Oddbods
programme.desc: Oddbods follows the wacky adventures of seven unique and furry friends, who laugh, play and get up to mischief in their hometown of Oddsville, where even the most ordinary of situations have unexpected consequences.

programme.title: Insectibles
programme.desc: After a body-swap potion mix-up leads to a kidnapping, the team must save their friend and then rush to a festival where another is the main course.

programme.title: Insectibles
programme.desc: While Lidia uses her new power to try and capture Zaks heart, Zak himself is busy recruiting a tiny mite for a mission to steal a Shrinkinator part.

programme.title: Blippi Wonders

programme.desc: The Day presents the past 24 hours: close to the people, with a clear focus on the essential issue, and guests who outline their viewpoints on the stories of the day.

programme.title: Ayat Dari Langit
programme.desc: Ustaz Muiz dan isterinya mengajar ajaran sesat dan mahu pengikutnya mengikut telunjuk mereka yang lama kelamaan mula membuatkan pengikutnya bernama Kamal mula merasa sangsi.

programme.title: Cinta Round 1
programme.desc: Farid is a nerdy guy who always been bullied by Syakirin, his senior. Farid determined to enter an MMA tournament organized by their university so to put an end to being bullied by Syakirin.

programme.title: Racun Suami Jahanam
programme.desc: Suraya is a naive village girl who looks forward to happy days when Hazrul proposes to her. But those happy days are only temporary when she learns who Hazrul really is.

programme.title: 6 Hari
programme.desc: Suzi is content with being a third wife and living alone in her bungalow as she only entertains her husband every 6 days. Everything comes crashing when a person from her past returns to her life.

programme.title: Please Subscribe Cintaku
programme.desc: Hannah and her friend Alia have gone to an abandoned construction site to find material for her YouTube channel, but she unknowingly records a murder.

programme.title: Diva Dari Jakarta
programme.desc: Erin dan Ejot sering dibandingkan dari segi paras rupa. Sehingga suatu hari sesuatu telah berlaku kepada Erin yang mengubah segalanya.

programme.title: Diam Tanda Setuju
programme.desc: Kisah dua sahabat baik yang berhadapan dengan konflik perhubungan di saat mereka mula panik memikirkan usia mereka yang semakin meningkat tetapi belum bertemu jodoh.

programme.title: Nasiya
programme.desc: Ketika melarikan diri dari bekas suaminya, Ihyana telah mengalami kemalangan tetapi dia bernasib baik kerana telah diselamatkan oleh satu entiti luar biasa yang telah mengubah kelakuannya.

programme.title: Suamiku Encik Beruang
programme.desc: Ani, the most beautiful girl in the village, who is ever mans fantasy, decides to marry Mr. Bear as her husband, much to everyones surprise. As for the chief village, he intend to organise the wedding of the year.

programme.title: Menanti Hari Itu
programme.desc: Kisah kasih sayang seorang ibu terhadap anak kandungnya yang tidak pernah terpadam meskipun si anak menjauhkan diri akibat hasutan keluarga angkatnya sendiri.

programme.title: Kecundang Sebelum Menjanda
programme.desc: Hari terbahagia dalam hidup Nora berubah menjadi suram bila tunangnya menarik diri pada hari pernikahan mereka. Tambah buruk lagi, hari selepas tragedi itu asyik berulang atas sebab-sebab misteri.

programme.title: We’ll be back at 6.00am
programme.desc: We’ll be back at 6.00am

programme.title: Aku Raja Lawak
programme.desc: Silah nak jadi pelawak yang terkenal, cuma di kampungnya tak ada peluang pekerjaan pelawak sepenuh masa. Tapi dia tetap mendapat sokongan padu daripada peminat nombor satunya – iaitu Faris, anaknya.

programme.title: Bayangan Emilia
programme.desc: Rita berpindah masuk ke banglo Ungku Mahmud dan mula merasai akan kehadiran roh yang seperti tidak senang dengan kehadirannya disitu. Apakah misteri di sebalik rumah banglo tersebut?

programme.title: Oh Speak English Please
programme.desc: Kisah Sally anak remaja moden yang merasa malu dengan ibunya kerana tidak pandai berbahasa Inggeris dan berketrampilan agak kekampungan. Lakonan Rozita Che Wan dan Zahirah MacWilson.

programme.title: Striker Hati Ayah
programme.desc: Sofia susah untuk memilih antara dua calon, Raf atau Noah. Lalu meminta pendapat ayahnya, Adam. Kini dua lelaki tersebut terpaksa memenangi hati ayah Sofia, seorang peminat fanatik bola.

programme.title: Gebu Gebu Manis
programme.desc: Kisah Hamdi dan Dolah yang memulakan perniagaan dodol tetapi sering disabotaj oleh Amira yang cemburu dengan perniagaan dua orang sahabat ini.

programme.title: Perangkap Perkahwinan
programme.desc: Three best friends promised to get married, at the same time when they turn 26 years old. Their perceptions of marriage life begin to change and conflict ensues.

programme.title: Cik Puan Sinderella
programme.desc: This is a lighthearted family drama about a teenage girl who is closely guarded by her mother.

programme.title: Anak Kerak
programme.desc: Husin telah menggunakan ilmu hitam iaitu dengan ‘Anak Kerak demi untuk mendapatkan kekebalan, kesenangan dan kemewahan hidup di dunia

programme.title: Jatuh Cinta Buta
programme.desc: Telefilem komedi romantik tentang perkenalan singkat di antara Zulin, seorang gadis yang tidak pernah bercinta, dengan Izlan, seorang duda dalam satu blind date yang diaturkan oleh Nadya Ramanshah.

programme.title: Matahari
programme.desc: Fauzi seorang guru yang telah dihantar untuk berkhidmat di Sabah. Di sana dia telah berkenalan dengan seorang novelis yang sedang mengalami masalah ‘writer’s block’ iaitu Yazid.

programme.title: Meniti Cinta Di Starimost
programme.desc: Iman dipaksa berkahwin dengan Qaseh, anak kepada orang gajinya untuk mewarisi harta bapanya. Percutian mereka di Bosnia membuahkan bibit-bibit cinta. Lakonan Iqram Dinzly, Zarina Zainoordin dan Yana Shamsudin.

programme.title: Jula Juli Bintang Putus Cinta
programme.desc: Telemovie sekuel Jula Juli Bintang Cinta kini kembali! Kali ini, Jula dan Juli mengalami konflik percintaan dengan Dani And Izham sehingga mereka memutuskan untuk berpisah dan melarikan diri ke kampung Juli.

programme.title: Kampung Kuala Lambat
programme.desc: Kampung Kuala Lambat bagai mengalami sumpahan apabila lelaki yang berkahwin muda akan mati di hari pernikahan mereka namun kejadian ganjil ini tidak berlaku kepada lelaki yang berusia 60 tahun ke atas.

programme.desc: We’ll be back at 6.00am

programme.title: Musnahkan Pelamin Anganku
programme.desc: Mikael yang merupakan seorang wedding planner menerima tawaran besar untuk menjayakan sebuah majlis perkahwinan pelanggannya. Namun majlis perkahwinan tersebut merupakan majlis bekas isterinya.

programme.title: Dua
programme.desc: Kisah Farhan yang kehilangan kembarnya Fahrin dalam satu kemalangan tragis. Dia kemudiannya mengambil-alih kehidupan Fahrin namun terperangkap dalam sebuah cinta tiga segi pula. Lakonan Eusoff Hashim dan Sharifah Sakinah.

programme.title: Racun Menantu
programme.desc: After marrying Zain, Sara lived in the same house with Pak Dolah, her father-in-law. Because of the familys grudge, Sara started making trouble by seducing her own father-in-law.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: An international news bulletin, presented live from the newsroom.

programme.title: Blindfire
programme.desc: A police officer who while responding to a violent hostage call, kills the African American suspect only to later learn of his innocence. Sensing this was a set-up, and facing repercussions, he must track down the person responsible while examining his own accountability and the ingrained racism which brought him to this point.

programme.title: Chosen Family
programme.desc: No information available

programme.title: Mister Mayfair - A Song To Kill For
programme.desc: Max Mayfair has it all; a beautiful girlfriend, Ava, a new London crime family, and thanks to his latest heist, a priceless diamond necklace. However, when mafioso Calbone’s henchmen catch up with Mike and Armen, determined to drag them back to New York to pay for their crimes, Max has everything to lose. Teaming up with his old friend, Marseille Mafia crime boss, Paul, Max hatches a plan to lure the New York Mafia to Mayfair.

programme.title: The Legion
programme.desc: Noreno, a half-Roman, is entrusted with the mission of crossing the snowy mountains of Armenia, swarming with Parthian patrols, to seek help for his slowly dying men.

programme.title: Escape Through Africa
programme.desc: Following a violent raid on her outpost, a British nurse, Anne is on the run with a small group of soldiers. She must balance bravery with compassion to save a native girl, her husband, and her colony.

programme.title: The Competition
programme.desc: No information available

programme.title: Heartbreakers
programme.desc: Max and Page, a brilliant mother-daughter swindler team, target the citys wealthiest men. Max marries them and then sues for alimony after she catches them involved in an affair with Page.

programme.title: Mister Mayfair - The Spyce Of Life
programme.desc: Returning from a romantic getaway with Ava, Max finds himself on the wrong side of the law yet again. Now blackmailed by MI6, Max must spy on two suspected terrorists; Aziz and Omar, who are regular customers at his club. Accompanied by his London crime family, Max breaks into Omar’s country estate and discovers his sinister plan. With everything on the line, Max must race to uncover a highly skilled hacker’s identity before it’s too late.

programme.title: Johnny And Clyde
programme.desc: Johnny and Clyde are two serial killers who are on an endless crime spree. They decide to assemble a group of criminals and misfits to steal from Alanas casino and pull off the heist of the century.

programme.title: Mister Mayfair - Serenas Game
programme.desc: Refusing to comply with Tommy’s demands, Max and Paul conspire to have the British gangster eliminated and Serena arrested. With Tommy dead and Serena in handcuffs, it appears as though Max has succeeded. His plan goes awry, however, when MI6 force Max to help Serena bring down her employers: the Russian mob. Torn between a life of crime with Serena or happiness with Ava, nothing is ever simple in the life of Max Mayfair.

programme.title: In Isolation
programme.desc: Four friends wanted to get away from it all in a remote country house but when a mysterious injured man turns up on their doorstep telling tales of a city ravaged by a epidemic and the looters who have pursued him, the friends rally to help.

programme.title: Centigrade
programme.desc: A married couple find themselves trapped in their frozen vehicle after a blizzard and struggle to survive amid plunging temperatures and unforeseen obstacles.

programme.title: Any Bullet Will Do
programme.desc: Two Brothers find themselves on opposing sides of the fight as one hopes to help abolish slavery while the other believes it is his God-given right.

programme.title: Enter The Clones of Bruce
programme.desc: Enter the Clones of Bruce dives into the Bruce Lee exploitation craze, otherwise known as Bruceploitation.

programme.title: Blowback
programme.desc: After planning a perfect heist, Nick is ready to score. One problem, his girl and the crew, have other ideas. They take Nick down in a hail of bullets but Nick doesnt die and in a race for his life, seeks revenge one target at a time.

programme.title: Come Out Fighting
programme.desc: During WWII, the American army have raced their way through the countryside on the border of France entering Nazi Germany. Hitler has deployed his secret weapon. Lieutenant Frank Ross encounters the Nazi weapon and an intense aerial battle ensues.

programme.title: Operation Sea Wolf
programme.desc: The German Navy and the last remaining U-Boats, were formed together for one last mission to attack the United States Homeland.

programme.title: Blood Of Redemption
programme.desc: When the most powerful criminal empire in the land comes crumbling down from within, it is up to a former henchman to put the puzzle pieces together in order to find those responsible and extract revenge.

programme.title: Hideout
programme.desc: Evading police at a remote farmhouse after fumbling a robbery, four criminals discover that the family living there is not who they appear to be.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: Hayes Hodges, an attorney, takes up the offer of defending his friend Colonel Terry Childers, accused of ordering his squad to open fire on a group of demonstrators.

programme.title: Pocket Listing
programme.desc: Double crosses, adultery, murder, mistaken identity, and revenge ensue when a mysterious power player and his sultry wife hire a disgraced Los Angeles property broker to discreetly market and sell their Malibu villa.

programme.title: A Tale Of Two Guns
programme.desc: A deputized gunslinger takes up the call to hunt down the last Cowboy, the chase is on and the bullets fly and only one of these hardened men can survive.

programme.title: The Commando
programme.desc: A DEA agent returns home with PTSD after a botched mission and must now protect his family from a home invasion when a recently freed convict and his henchmen come after their stash of millions hidden inside of the agents home.

programme.title: Chosen
programme.desc: The Jews of Eastern Europe are being massacred by the thousands. Galvanised into action after the death of his wife, Hungarian barrister Sonson finds himself leading an inspirational fight back against the increasingly desperate and dangerous Nazis.

programme.title: Broken Star
programme.desc: Abandoned by her friends and family and with her career in jeopardy, starlet Markey Marlowe is sequestered in a duplex with a reclusive landlord who just may be more dangerous than she is.

programme.title: Rat Race
programme.desc: A Las Vegas casino magnate, determined to find a new avenue for wagering, sets up a race for money.

programme.title: Mojave Diamonds
programme.desc: A former MMA fighter and his brothers must rescue their kidnapped family from a dangerous crime syndicate after $50M of illegal diamonds gets stolen.

programme.title: Hunting Games
programme.desc: Two dangerous armed men must hunt each other and fight to death over millions of dollars in cash in this high octane wilderness survival story.

programme.title: American Sicario
programme.desc: Based on the true story, Edgar Valdez, drug lord and cartel leader, is betrayed by one of the brothers. Seeking retribution, Valdez will risk it all to gain control of the Feliz cartel.

programme.title: FAN FAVORITES
programme.desc: Your top picks are back! FAN FAVORITES showcases the hottest celebrity moments, fashion highlights, and unforgettable content that you loved most. Watch what everyones raving about!

programme.title: Saka Sisters
programme.desc: Recently, Laila and Suri lost their father. They were shocked with the presence of a ‘saka’, Jamal. Jamal follows them wherever they go. As long as they live, Jamal belongs to them.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its time to sing along with JJ through a day of adventures! Join the exciting doggy hunt to find Bingo on his birthday. Use your imagination to play the floor is lava with the family. Learn how to take care of pets and see all the kids favorite toys during Play and Tell at school. Get a surprise visit from a real fire engine and join a Thanksgiving feast that celebrates family and friends.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Follow our favorite curious baby, Baby John, through a day of exciting discoveries. Watch him learn new things during playtime, interact with his loving family at the dinner table, and get ready for bed after a long and happy day of fun. Its a heartwarming look at the small but wonderful moments in a babys day.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Its Little Angel! Where baby John, his brother, Jack, and sister, Jill inspire kids and families to have fun and to grow and learn through play. Come sing along!

programme.title: Blippi Wonders
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is a wonderful place! Join Blippi Wonders as he learns about creatures of all shapes and sizes. He discovers how a caterpillar turns into a butterfly, why a camel has a hump, and what makes a whale so big. From the jungle to the farm, its an animal adventure full of fun and fascinating facts.

programme.title: Blippi Wonders
programme.desc: Come along on fun adventures as Blippi journeys off in his BlippiMobile to answer burning questions such as How does a rainbow get its colors? and why is Blippis popsicle melting?. Luckily he has his faithful sidekicks TABBS and D.BO to help him find the answers.

programme.title: ARPO
programme.desc: Every day is an adventure with ARPO and Daniel! Watch them play hide-and-seek, try to convince Daniel to eat his veggies, and build an amazing treehouse. Along the way, theyll deal with pesky squirrels and mysterious noises. These stories are all about friendship, problem-solving, and having fun together.

programme.title: ARPO
programme.desc: Army commando-robot ARPO has been assigned his toughest mission yet: babysitter! With a built-in radar system that scans for danger and an arsenal of baby gear set to deploy at a moments notice, ARPO is programmed to protect. As simple tasks like bath time, feeding, taking a nap, and changing diapers somehow turn into action-packed adventures thanks to Dannys curiosity, ARPO has his work cut out for him.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its song and dance time! Join JJ, his friends and family celebrating lifes big moments for little kids. Come along and be part of their fun everyday adventures.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its time for some fun with friends! In this playful story, JJ and his best pals learn how to share their toys and work together as a team. From the playground to the classroom, they discover that every activity is more fun when you do it with friends. Its a musical celebration of teamwork and friendship.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Get ready to learn with JJ! Embark on a musical journey that starts with the ABC Song, making it fun to learn every letter. Once youve mastered the alphabet, the adventure continues with a trip back in time to count from one to ten with a group of silly dinosaurs. Its a fun-filled lesson that makes learning feel like a game.

programme.title: Morphle
programme.desc: My Magic Pet Morphle follows the adventures of Mila and her magical morphing pet, Morphle. Whether they need to stop a magic pet who doesnt know how to control their powers, the town Bandits from stealing things, or the mischievous Orphle from causing havoc, Mila and Morphle always work together to help out!

programme.title: Morphle
programme.desc: From stopping bullies to fixing broken toys, theres no problem too big or small for Morphle! In this magical adventure, Milas pet morphs into all sorts of incredible things-a giant construction vehicle, a speeding race car, a mighty T-Rex-to help people and protect the city. Its a showcase of Morphles most amazing and heroic transformations.

programme.title: Rob the Robot
programme.desc: Rob the writer needs some help! When he cant finish the story hes writing, the crew heads to the Story Book Planet to find the perfect ending. Afterwards, wanting to meet a real knight, they take a trip to the Medieval Planet, but the knight they find has no manners at all!

programme.title: Rob the Robot
programme.desc: Get ready for some ups and downs! After a series of mishaps on the Elevator Planet, Orbit learns that being honest and taking responsibility is the best way to solve a problem. Later, Rob and Ema are eager to show off their aviation knowledge on the Aviation Planet but end up taking off in an unexpected direction.

programme.title: Little Baby Bum
programme.desc: Little Baby Bum follows the musical adventures of Mia, Twinkle the Star and Baby Max. Everyday moments like bath time, getting dressed, or playing peekaboo become even more fun with new and classic nursery rhymes.

programme.title: Little Baby Bum
programme.desc: Get ready for a nursery rhyme fun time! The friends pretend to row their boats in laundry baskets. They do a fun Hop Little Bunnies dance and play Ring-A-Ring O Roses in the garden. They build a bridge with blocks and Mr. Giraffe takes them all for a ride on the bus. Plus, they help two little birds and have a parade with homemade instruments.

programme.title: Go Buster: Specials
programme.desc: Its Christmas Eve, but Santa has an accident and wont be able to fly his sleigh. So he calls in his old friend Jada and with the help of Buster the Bus, they can still save Christmas and make sure everyone gets their presents on time. Its a race against time, but Buster is up for the challenge!

programme.title: Go Buster
programme.desc: Learn how to stay clean and healthy with Buster! When Buster gets stuck in the mud and then a slimy green puddle, he needs to go to the carwash to get clean. After getting a wobbly tooth from eating too many sweets, he learns about the importance of good dental hygiene. Plus, see what happens when Buster gets sick and his friend Scout fetches Amber the Ambulance to help him feel better.

programme.title: Geckos Garage
programme.desc: Geckos Garage is the repair shop that cares. Run by cheerful mechanic Gecko and his trusty robot sidekicks, The Mechanicals, the garage takes care of all the vehicles in town and keeps them running smoothly. Whether its fixing a flat tyre, stopping a rocket-powered ice cream truck, or rescuing a vehicle thats stuck in the mud, Gecko is always on hand to help with a friendly smile and a can-do attitude!

programme.title: Geckos Garage
programme.desc: Baby Truck is always ready for an adventure, and today hes leading his friends on an exciting exploration! Their playtime takes a messy turn when Baby Trucks curiosity gets the better of him, and he ends up stuck deep in the mud. It looks like hes in real trouble, but his friends wont leave him behind. This is a wonderful tale of how the smallest heroes, working together as a team, can solve even the stickiest of problems.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Welcome to the learning city farm! Help Ella count all the buses as they drive by. Join Grandma Mei for a fun and active dance session. Make a healthy salad while dancing the salsa and learn how to recycle to save the planet. Plus, learn a silly song to cheer up a friend and celebrate everything that grows with the Growing Song.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Get ready for some singing fun at Lellobee City Farm! Learn your ABCs in the Boogie Barn and then learn how to wash your hands before eating some delicious dumplings. Help Ella play Mummy Duck and keep all the baby ducks together. When accidents happen, sing a boo boo song to feel better. End the day with a special Chinese lullaby from Grandma Mei at a sleepover.

programme.title: Minibods
programme.desc: Welcome to the fantastical planet of Bod, home to the Minibods. Join six furry baby friends as they get up to hilarious mayhem, turning everyday situations into unexpected, super silly events. Whatever life throws their way, the Minibods overcome hurdles the unconventional way, to better understand themselves and the world around them.

programme.title: Minibods
programme.desc: Its party time with Pogo! Hes invited to Jeffs party, but they cant agree on what kind of party it should be. Bubbles invents a new bouncy blob that gets out of control. When Lulu loses her favorite bunny, Bubbles becomes her superhero and helps her find it. Plus, Fuse learns that eating his greens will give him more energy.

The ducklings have their first flying lesson and the friends clean out the pond to give the animals a nice new home. Plus, celebrate the Moon Festival with a special party.

programme.desc: Its time to do the scarecrow dance! Help Sunny the Scarecrow scare away some pesky pigeons to protect the farms crops. Its harvest time, so everyone helps pick the vegetables. The family learns about what to wear in any weather and Daddy makes fun shadow puppets on the wall.

programme.desc: Little Baby Bum is here to help you fall to sleep with soothing, relaxing animated lullabies. These gentle and sensory videos are accompanied by lullaby versions of much-loved nursery rhymes, helping to take you to the land of nod.

Though hes a little nervous, he learns that trying new things isnt so scary after all and can even be a fun adventure.

programme.title: Blippi Wonders
programme.desc: Come along on fun adventures as Blippi journeys off in his BlippiMobile to answer burning questions such as How does a rainbow get its colors? and why is Blippis popsicle melting?. Luckily he has his faithful sidekicks TABBS and D.BO to help him find the answers.

programme.title: Blippi Wonders
programme.desc: Lets love our planet with Blippi and friends! In a special musical episode, they sing all about recycling and taking care of the Earth. Blippi and Meekah build the ultimate playground, the Blippi Clubhouse! Then, join an adventure down a river as a boulder becomes sand and travel back in time to see how even the smallest dinosaur can be a big help. Blippi also learns about lions and how to mix colors to paint a beautiful rainbow.

programme.title: ARPO
programme.desc: Army commando-robot ARPO has been assigned his toughest mission yet: babysitter! With a built-in radar system that scans for danger and an arsenal of baby gear set to deploy at a moments notice, ARPO is programmed to protect. As simple tasks like bath time, feeding, taking a nap, and changing diapers somehow turn into action-packed adventures thanks to Dannys curiosity, ARPO has his work cut out for him.

programme.title: ARPO
programme.desc: Join ARPO for a day of non-stop chaos! When a simple handprint painting session with Daniel turns into a colorful mess, thats just the beginning. A pesky drone interrupts their peaceful afternoon, leading to an all-out battle for the backyard. See how ARPO handles one unexpected event after another in this wild and wacky tale.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its song and dance time! Join JJ, his friends and family celebrating lifes big moments for little kids. Come along and be part of their fun everyday adventures.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its song and dance time! Join JJ, his friends and family celebrating lifes big moments for little kids. Come along and be part of their fun everyday adventures.

programme.title: CeCe Time
programme.desc: Enjoy playtime on the farm with CeCe! Join Cece for a day of fun where she connects with the farm animals in her own special way. She imagines herself as Little Bo Peep on an adventure to rescue her lost toy sheep. Later, Farmer Cece helps round up her classmates, who are all pretending to be different farm animals, just in time for a snack. Its a day of imagination and fun on the farm!

programme.title: Morphle
programme.desc: Theres a new morphing creature in town, and hes up to no good! Orphle, a naughty green lookalike of Morphle, leads his gang of bandits on a city-wide mischief spree. Its up to Mila and the real Morphle to become heroes, chasing down the troublemakers and using their own clever transformations to clean up the chaotic mess.

programme.title: Morphle
programme.desc: My Magic Pet Morphle follows the adventures of Mila and her magical morphing pet, Morphle. Whether they need to stop a magic pet who doesnt know how to control their powers, the town Bandits from stealing things, or the mischievous Orphle from causing havoc, Mila and Morphle always work together to help out!

programme.title: Rob the Robot
programme.desc: The crews new job is being space cat petsitters for Emas cousins pet, Violet! They have to work together to figure out what the fidgety cat needs. After their petsitting adventure, Ema wants to learn a new skill, so the friends travel to the Origami Planet to learn how to make paper airplanes.

programme.title: Rob the Robot
programme.desc: The gang rockets off to the Dance Planet for an intergalactic competition, where they have fun discovering new music until TK admits she doesnt know how to dance. Later, when Ema is sad that shes so different from her robot friends, they all travel to the Spare Parts Planet to help her realize being unique is wonderful.

programme.title: Little Baby Bum
programme.desc: Little Baby Bum follows the musical adventures of Mia, Twinkle the Star and Baby Max. Everyday moments like bath time, getting dressed, or playing peekaboo become even more fun with new and classic nursery rhymes.

programme.title: Little Baby Bum
programme.desc: Get ready to sing along with all your favorite friends! When Miss Pollys dolly gets sick, Twinkle and Mummy are there to help. The family takes a sleepy bus ride home and the kids learn to be nimble and brave at the ball pit. They make their own instruments, learn about colors and have a fun day at the farm. Its a day of music, learning and fun!

programme.title: Go Buster
programme.desc: Buster becomes the backwards bus when he accepts a challenge from Bandit. He also becomes a bubble bus when he gets trapped in a giant bubble at the carwash. He and Scout race to get a new siren and he tries on new tires that are all the wrong size. He even becomes an ambulance bus to save his friend and a disco detective to find a lost friend in a disco tunnel.

programme.title: Go Buster: Specials
programme.desc: Its Christmas Eve, but Santa has an accident and wont be able to fly his sleigh. So he calls in his old friend Jada and with the help of Buster the Bus, they can still save Christmas and make sure everyone gets their presents on time. Its a race against time, but Buster is up for the challenge!

programme.title: Geckos Garage
programme.desc: Geckos Garage is the repair shop that cares. Run by cheerful mechanic Gecko and his trusty robot sidekicks, The Mechanicals, the garage takes care of all the vehicles in town and keeps them running smoothly. Whether its fixing a flat tyre, stopping a rocket-powered ice cream truck, or rescuing a vehicle thats stuck in the mud, Gecko is always on hand to help with a friendly smile and a can-do attitude!

programme.title: Geckos Garage
programme.desc: Its a day of pure adventure for Gecko and his friends! The fun starts when a brand new bouncy castle arrives at the garage. Afterward, the weather turns chilly, and the trucks have a wonderful time playing in the snow. This story is all about finding fun and excitement in every situation.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Get ready for some singing fun at Lellobee City Farm! Learn your ABCs in the Boogie Barn and then learn how to wash your hands before eating some delicious dumplings. Help Ella play Mummy Duck and keep all the baby ducks together. When accidents happen, sing a boo boo song to feel better. End the day with a special Chinese lullaby from Grandma Mei at a sleepover.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Welcome to the learning city farm! Help Ella count all the buses as they drive by. Join Grandma Mei for a fun and active dance session. Make a healthy salad while dancing the salsa and learn how to recycle to save the planet. Plus, learn a silly song to cheer up a friend and celebrate everything that grows with the Growing Song.

programme.title: Minibods
programme.desc: Gather round for storytime! Jeff gets a new book but doesnt want to share it with the other Minibods. Newt finds an injured Oddfrog and tries to nurse it back to health. Bubbles gets stage fright before a big show and has to find her confidence. She also finds a giant bubble and tries to take it home without it popping.

programme.title: Minibods
programme.desc: Welcome to the fantastical planet of Bod, home to the Minibods. Join six furry baby friends as they get up to hilarious mayhem, turning everyday situations into unexpected, super silly events. Whatever life throws their way, the Minibods overcome hurdles the unconventional way, to better understand themselves and the world around them.

programme.title: CeCe Time
programme.desc: Enjoy playtime on the farm with CeCe! Join Cece for a day of fun where she connects with the farm animals in her own special way. She imagines herself as Little Bo Peep on an adventure to rescue her lost toy sheep. Later, Farmer Cece helps round up her classmates, who are all pretending to be different farm animals, just in time for a snack. Its a day of imagination and fun on the farm!

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its song and dance time! Join JJ, his friends and family celebrating lifes big moments for little kids. Come along and be part of their fun everyday adventures.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its song and dance time! Join JJ, his friends and family celebrating lifes big moments for little kids. Come along and be part of their fun everyday adventures.

programme.title: Playtime With Twinkle
programme.desc: Lets learn about colors and shapes! Twinkle has fun painting a picture with lots of different colors. She and her friends learn all about the colors of the rainbow, first with some baby birds, then on a rainbow slide and finally with a rainbow bubble bath. They build a tower with rainbow stones and learn all about the different shapes of the clouds.

programme.title: Playtime With Twinkle
programme.desc: Get ready for some fun and learning with Twinkle! She builds a sandcastle and learns about different shapes. She plants some seeds and watches them grow into beautiful flowers. She finds some colorful balloons and learns to count. She also learns about animal sounds, different kinds of fruit and how to make music. Plus, the friends build a snowman and play a fun game of peek-a-boo.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its time to wind down with JJ. Follow his soothing bedtime routine, from taking a warm bath to brushing his teeth. As he looks out his window at the night sky, he sings Twinkle Twinkle Little Star before snuggling into bed for a sweet lullaby. Its a peaceful and relaxing journey into dreamland.

programme.title: Little World
programme.desc: Get ready for some evening sing-along fun! The family finds five little ducks by the lake and helps Itsy Bitsy Spider get back home. At a party, the twins learn the importance of choosing healthy snacks. They also learn to be kind to each other, have a fun playdate and play a game of peek-a-boo. At the end of the day, they learn how to use the potty with a happy potty dance.

programme.title: Little Baby Bum: Lullabies
programme.desc: Little Baby Bum is here to help you fall to sleep with soothing, relaxing animated lullabies. These gentle and sensory videos are accompanied by lullaby versions of much-loved nursery rhymes, helping to take you to the land of nod.

programme.title: Oddbods: Short
programme.desc: Welcome to the wonderfully weird world of the Oddbods! This collection of bite-size adventures follows seven colorful friends with very big, and very different, personalities. Whether its Fuses hot-headedness, Pogos pranks, or Zees laziness, their unique traits clash in spectacular fashion. Watch as simple, everyday situations spiral into unpredictable and hilarious mayhem, proving that with the Oddbods, life is never, ever dull.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its song and dance time! Join JJ, his friends and family celebrating lifes big moments for little kids. Come along and be part of their fun everyday adventures.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its song and dance time! Join JJ, his friends and family celebrating lifes big moments for little kids. Come along and be part of their fun everyday adventures.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Being a good friend is the best! Join JJ as he learns some very important lessons. When his friends want to play, he discovers the joy of sharing. Through a day of play, he learns that saying please and thank you and being kind makes every game more fun for everyone.

programme.title: Minibods
programme.desc: Welcome to the fantastical planet of Bod, home to the Minibods. Join six furry baby friends as they get up to hilarious mayhem, turning everyday situations into unexpected, super silly events. Whatever life throws their way, the Minibods overcome hurdles the unconventional way, to better understand themselves and the world around them.

programme.title: Minibods

Bubbles gets stage fright before a big show and has to find her confidence. She also finds a giant bubble and tries to take it home without it popping.

programme.title: Geckos Garage
programme.desc: Geckos Garage is the repair shop that cares. Run by cheerful mechanic Gecko and his trusty robot sidekicks, The Mechanicals, the garage takes care of all the vehicles in town and keeps them running smoothly. Whether its fixing a flat tyre, stopping a rocket-powered ice cream truck, or rescuing a vehicle thats stuck in the mud, Gecko is always on hand to help with a friendly smile and a can-do attitude!

programme.title: Geckos Garage
programme.desc: Get ready for some Baby Bus Mayhem! Baby Truck and Molly learn the importance of sharing their toys. A magic show takes a turn when Yellow Mechanical gets stuck to a giant magnet. At firefighter school, Dandy gets himself into a tricky situation. Weasel causes trouble by cheating in a football match and showing off his faulty gadgets at the fix-up fair, but Gecko and Grandma are there to save the day.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Get ready for some singing fun at Lellobee City Farm! Learn your ABCs in the Boogie Barn and then learn how to wash your hands before eating some delicious dumplings. Help Ella play Mummy Duck and keep all the baby ducks together. When accidents happen, sing a boo boo song to feel better. End the day with a special Chinese lullaby from Grandma Mei at a sleepover.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Its time to explore Earth and nature! A frog ballerina shows Ella that rain can be fun and is important for the farm. The friends celebrate Earth Day by litter picking and composting. When some of the animals get sick, Ella helps the vet at a makeshift animal hospital. Plus, watch a caterpillar turn into a butterfly and learn some yoga moves with Rishis mom.

programme.title: Family Spy
programme.desc: Ep06 Roz dan Rin diserang. Dia menjejak para penyerangnya ke pangkalan rahsia mereka. Ejen Mah dihantar untuk menyiasat tetapi dia ditangkap. Roz, Datin Seri dan Rin bekerjasama membebaskan Ejen Mah dan Roz dapat mengalahkan Nora, ketua penculik. Tetapi Dr Kaos Jr telah maju selangkah dan bereksperimen dengan senjata barunya.

programme.title: #Tom Tom Bak Series
programme.desc: Datuk Aznil Haji Nawawi turun padang sempena pencarian bakat baru #TomTomBak. Ramai yang hadir untuk menonjolkan bakat yang mereka ada. Bermacam ragam And aksi lucu dapat kita saksikan. Anak-anak yang petah berborak juga turut dicari untuk musim terbaru ini.

programme.title: Geng Gajet
programme.desc: Perniagaan Kedai Bob semakin merosot dan Geng memutuskan untuk merancang And membina kedai dalam talian yang akhirnya memperoleh kejayaan! Namun, masalah berlaku apabila pemilik kedai pesaing menggoda Hafiz dengan perjanjian yang akan mengkhianati rakan-rakannya.

programme.title: Oh My English!
programme.desc: Di SMK Ayer Dalam, ‘Kelas 3 Merah terkenal sebagai kelas yang mempunyai berbagai kerenah. Pelajar-pelajarnya nakal, suka buat bising. Subjek yang mereka paling tidak gemar ialah Bahasa Inggeris.

programme.desc: Ep06 Roz dan Rin diserang. Dia menjejak para penyerangnya ke pangkalan rahsia mereka. Ejen Mah dihantar untuk menyiasat tetapi dia ditangkap. Roz, Datin Seri dan Rin bekerjasama membebaskan Ejen Mah dan Roz dapat mengalahkan Nora, ketua penculik. Tetapi Dr Kaos Jr telah maju selangkah dan bereksperimen dengan senjata barunya.

programme.title: Best Of Pets

programme.title: Cute Pet Guide
programme.desc: The meerkat king from Madagascar is funny, but meerkats in real life are well-behaved, cuddly and they heal our hearts! Pocket sized pets are currently all the rage, but there are details you need to pay attention to when raising them. For example, hedgehogs are highly defensive, timid sugar gliders will harm themselves without being next to their owners, and cute guinea pigs like Norman from the movie The Secret Life of Pets are easily abandoned due to being easy to obtain and raise, etc. Dont worry, experts will teach you how to raise them! Come to a restaurant in Kaohsiung to get up close with Rocket Raccoon from The Avengers!

programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: Dr. Matt must deal with his greatest fear -V a tarantula. But hes forced to hide his phobia, as he demonstrates handling techniques to help local students overcome their worries.

programme.title: Scruffts
programme.desc: Six dogs, six handlers, all competing in the world’s largest and most famous dog show: Crufts.nnBut they are not the pedigree pooches who compete to be labelled Best in Show. These are the loveable family pets competing to win the Scruffts title.

programme.title: Have A Pet Day
programme.desc: Renowned Golden Bell awarded host Sandy Wu takes her beloved dog Hershey on outings, inviting celebrities and their adorable pets to join in the fun. Beyond exploring nature, the show delves into heartfelt conversations about the journey of pet ownership and shares touching stories amid delightful scenery and cuisine. The program features various enjoyable activities where owners and pets can bond, creating unforgettable memories through laughter and tears.

programme.title: ...Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: From Christmas as youve never experienced it before, with out-of-tune carol singers, Santa getting stuck, ungrateful children and exploding Christmas puddings - to OAPs, kids and even blundering burglars, six brand spanking new topics are given the trademark LOL treatment, combining user-generated footage with comic narration by comedian Iain Lee. Theres a treat too for animal lovers with a Puppies special featuring some of the cutest, as well as funniest, puppy clips on the web.

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: In the West Midlands Inspector Herchy Boal receives an anonymous call about a labradoodle who is reportedly underweight with infected ears and dirty matted fur. Its up to Herchy to get to the bottom of this reported neglect.

programme.title: Best Of Pets
programme.desc: Another episode of Best of Pets with funny pet clips.

programme.title: ...Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: Weve scoured the internet clean to bring you the most entertaining puppy clips out there: overexcited pups, pilfering pups, pups who fall asleep in their dinner bowls, puppy vloggers, driving pups, and even a look at the latest craze: pups who go into a quivering frenzy at the sight of-K doorstoppers.

programme.title: Have A Pet Day
programme.desc: Renowned Golden Bell awarded host Sandy Wu takes her beloved dog Hershey on outings, inviting celebrities and their adorable pets to join in the fun. Beyond exploring nature, the show delves into heartfelt conversations about the journey of pet ownership and shares touching stories amid delightful scenery and cuisine. The program features various enjoyable activities where owners and pets can bond, creating unforgettable memories through laughter and tears.

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: In Essex Animal Collection officer Joe Whites on his way to pick up a dog thats been left abandoned and tethered to the edge of a bridge. Last year the charity received over 63,000 reports of abandoned animals, and nearly half of those were dogs. When Joe arrives in Harlow, the lady who found the dog has moved him to a place of safety and is waiting with a couple of concerned neighbours. With his bones clearly visible through his already skinny frame, the poor dog is worryingly thin. But a lack of food isnt all thats wrong, there are scars on his face and body that suggest hes been through a hard youth. To try and piece together the dogs history Joe needs all the information he can gather.

programme.title: Cute Pets At Home
programme.desc: Ali the elephant at Shoushan Zoo, carries the childhood memories of many children, both young and old. Although he is now 49 years old, he is still energetic under the care of the keepers. Once the new zoo is completed, the public will be able to see Ali again. When the caregiver helps Ali take a shower, Ali will take the opportunity to replenish his body with water; sometimes he will step on water in the pool and use his nose to enjoy the fun of playing in the water. nThere are currently only three African elephants in Taiwan. In addition to Ali, the other two are in the Taipei City Zoo. Because African elephants are endangered wild animals, their import and export are strictly controlled. If these three elephants die in the future, Taiwan may no longer see any African elephants. Shoushan Zoo vows to take good care of Ali so that Alis heartwarming story can continue, and shoulder the mission of life education, so that everyones visit to the Shoushan Zoo is the starting point of happy memories. In addition to Ali the elephant, Shoushan Zoo currently has two white rhinos, male Xiqi from the Taipei City Zoo and female Baby who was bred naturally in the zoo. nWhite rhino Xiqi was loaned to Shoushan Zoo in hope that he could successfully mate with the female white rhino Baby to raise the white rhino population.

programme.desc: Another episode of Best of Pets with funny pet clips.

programme.desc: The charm of cute rabbits is irresistible! An old man raised hundreds of rabbits?! Playful little rabbits are spoiled yet timid! programme.title: ...Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: Weve got stupid vs intelligent dogs, talented dogs, sporty dogs, pug life, dogs getting stuck, sleepy dogs, and dogs acting like humans.

programme.title: My House And Other Animals
programme.desc: Meet the modern-day Dr Doolittles with a passion for all creatures great and small: the unsung heroes of the wildlife world, whose homes have become havens for every animal imaginable.

programme.title: Best Of Pets
programme.desc: Another episode of Best of Pets with funny pet clips.

programme.title: Cute Pet Guide
programme.desc: Fishes swim in the water. What a healing thing it would be to be able to look at the blue ocean every day if we can own an underwater world at home! How can one be the creator of the underwater world? Moreover, in this small ecosystem, most players are male and they even jokingly describe each other as going underwater; Cute Pet Guide takes you to appreciate the mystery of going underwater!

programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: Dr. Matt is asked by a local cat charity to treat a litter of tiny abandoned kittens. Theyre so weak, its touch and go whether any of them will survive.

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: In the UK nearly a quarter of the adult population have made a dog part of their family. But there are some reports RSPCA inspectors respond to that have them thinking otherwise, and in Staffordshire Inspector Charlotte Melvin is left reeling from the shock of what she finds when she investigates one such case. She receives a complaint about a house full of animals, some in cages and living in cramped and dirty conditions. When she arrived things looked so bad that Charlotte calls the police who help her gain access to the property. Inside theres a menagerie of different creatures, from a fox to a snake, to a lizard, all suffering in totally unsuitable quarters. Two of the worst affected are dogs Mocha and Lexi. Mocha has extreme hair loss. As well as having the same terrible skin problems as Mocha, Lexi is also severely emaciated. Charlotte must act fast to help all the animals to survive.

programme.title: Cute Pets At Home
programme.desc: The white cockatoo is one of the more common macaw species, but its number in the wild has gradually declined in recent years. Hand-reared white cockatoos love to be close to their owners. Their large size is one of their features. Like other large macaws, white cockatoos are really loud, but if its a hand-reared bird raised from a young age, the situation of screaming will be much better. If you want to raise a pair of adult birds, it is ideal to keep them in an open area with good sound insulation or without neighbors. Their friendly personalities make them one of the more suitable large macaw species as pets.

programme.title: Summer Surf n Turf
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde kicks lobster And steak to the curb as he puts a Spanish-style spin on your typical surf ‘n’ turf by creating Pork And Clams, Lobster and Mushroom Fideos, and Tomato And Tuna Bread then washing it all down with a tasty Michelada.

programme.title: Bougie Badass Burgers
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde brings your basic burgers to a new level with his dry-aged beef burger with potatoes and truffle dijon mayo, a part-beef part-pork belly burger with cheddar And an egg, and lastly a crispy mushroom tortilla burger with salsa And cheese.

programme.title: Luxe Lobster And Prime Rib
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde pulls out all the stops for this daddy-sized dinner. He grills up prime rib with herb And horseradish crust, lobster And chili sauce American, charred green beans with garlic tahini, and cheddar-stuffed parker house rolls.

programme.title: Summer Seafood Smorgasbord
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde gets his beach vibes going with a grilled shrimp And lobster cocktail, clams with lemon breadcrumbs, a killer grilled king crab with burnt citrus butter, and a chilled mango frozen daiquiri. Don’t you dare miss this beach party!

programme.title: Feast of Killer Crab And Perfect Pork Belly
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde prepares a finger food feast with char grilled chili crab, spiced adobo potatoes, grilled pork belly, And sofrito stuffed branzino all served on a bed of rice over banana leaves. Call your friends - this is a feast that will feed many!

programme.title: Deluxe Dogs with Crusted Corn And Potatoes
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde puts a modern spin on a classic All-American cookout with his loaded hot dogs, spiced smashed potato salad, chorizo And corn nut crusted corn, and bangin’ banana pudding pops. Sparklers out for this spread!

programme.title: Scrumptious Summer Sandwiches
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde channels his inner sandwich lover by making an angry lobster club with pepper aioli and grilled bacon, a lamb birria torta with avocado and ramen consomme, and his an Italian beef combo with chili crisp cheese sauce, and giardiniera.

programme.title: Pizzapalooza
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde is throwin’ down a pizza spread like never before with his Chicago-style tavern pie with sausage And onion, a grilled pizza pocket with pepperoni And cheese, chicken wings a la pizzaiola, and a zesty grilled caesar salad to finish it off.

programme.title: The Future is Flavor
programme.desc: Frankie harnesses the power of time to transform simple ingredients into flavorful goods that’ll stick around for a long time. Learn the basics of preserving, pickling And curing to make dinner anything but a struggle. It just takes a little patience.

programme.title: Spooktacular Tricks and Treats
programme.desc: Don’t let the line of trick-or-treaters or the candy corn overload scare you out of the kitchen this Halloween. Frankie’s got tricks up his sleeve to make simple yet wicked good treats for everyone at the party to enjoy. All while saving some dough.

programme.title: Eggscellent Techniques
programme.desc: In this special technique episode, Frankie teaches us several methods for cooking a quintessential ingredient: eggs. The scramble, the omelet, the Benedict – learn to make them just the way you like them.

programme.title: Cabbage, cabbage, cabbage
programme.desc: Cabbage has long been an underrated green on the field, and it’s about time Frankie gives it a starring role. This leafy head proves itself as the versatile ingredient we need it to be, affordable year around, delicious and filling.

programme.title: An Eggplant Extravaganza
programme.desc: Eggplant: A fruit you didn’t know was a fruit. Often underrated and overlooked, Frankie shows us how to shop for and cook this filling, delicious, cost-effective, and versatile ingredient. The days of mushy, bitter eggplant will be long gone.

programme.title: Plant-Based Budget Meals
programme.desc: Frankie busts the myth that eating plant-based is expensive. Preparing these good-for-you meals is all about eating seasonally and shopping the bulk aisle to save money on produce. It’s nutritious and great for the planet. Win-win!

programme.title: The Weekly Struggle Budget
programme.desc: Frankie figured out the weekly budget grocery equation so you don’t have to. Breakfast, lunch, and dinner for seven days, for a family of four, for under $150. All it takes is a little planning, meal prep, and using up leftovers in inventive ways.

programme.title: Turn Up For Tomatoes
programme.desc: Frankie teaches us how to prepare tomatoes fresh in a variety of ways. And for even more savings, Frankie will share a few tips on how to preserve them so you can enjoy their freshness throughout the year.

programme.title: Date Night
programme.desc: Date night doesn’t have to be at an over-priced, mediocre restaurant. Frankie prepares an affordable and delicious sushi date night at home, plus tips on how to set date night ambiance at home on a struggle budget. That special someone will love it!

programme.title: Lunches for Work
programme.desc: A big way to save money is to prepare homemade lunches for work. Frankie shows us how to make five delicious lunches for the whole work week. Youll be saving money, and you might even be more productive at work after a nutritious homemade lunch!

programme.title: Party for Pennies
programme.desc: Frankie makes three dishes for a party of four, that when combined, are cheaper than just one meal out for brunch. Then, its a taco party for five people for only $20!

programme.title: Food Back from the Dead
programme.desc: Stale bread, old bananas, canned food, dry foods... theyve all gotten a bad wrap, but this is not the end of them yet! Dont let this stuff sit in the pantry, dont let it go to waste - Frankie encourages you to stretch further and cheaper!

programme.title: A Thanksgiving Harvest
programme.desc: Time to dig in to the one holiday of the year that is all about the food! Think outside the pumpkin pie crust for these four unique offerings. Mia’s got you covered with the bread, two show-stopping desserts, and a creative way to use your leftovers!

programme.title: Holiday Cookies
programme.desc: Cookies are the number one baked item during the holidays. Mia shows us how to make some new and inspiring recipes; from buttercream stickers to zebra shortbread leading to a final bake that will make any cookie lover do a double take!

programme.title: Gingerbread Spectacular!
programme.desc: It’s time to celebrate all things gingerbread! This classic holiday flavor gets an update from Mia. From the not-so-basic cake, to the most delectable cookie, and finally the ultimate gingerbread house; Mia will show why this is a holiday staple.

programme.title: Holiday Party Treats
programme.desc: Host the ultimate holiday party with these sweet and savory recipes for a crowd! Create a spread for all to enjoy. Mia will whip up wintery bark, bake a savory holiday wreath, and design a cupcake tree complete with sugared and piped ornaments.

programme.title: Scrumptious Summer Sandwiches

programme.title: Pizzapalooza

programme.title: Side Hustles
programme.desc: From a lawyer to an actor to an insurance analyst, Stephanie discovers a world of folks who’ve turned their passion for cooking into side hustle food businesses. From dumplings, sushi and pretzels she explores how they balance their day jobs.

programme.title: Comfort Foods
programme.desc: Latin-inspired ice cream to Caribbean, Channa curry doubles to gourmet, deli sandwiches; Stephanie Izard shows what comfort food means to 3 very different cooks and learns how they turned their childhood memories into thriving food businesses.

programme.title: Cooking with Fire
programme.desc: Stephanie meets 3 cooks who use fire in different ways to create distinct dishes. Using their love of cooking over an open flame; these cooks introduce her to the diverse flavors of Armenia; a classic Italian hero, and infrared grilled Brazilian BBQ

programme.title: Secret Pizza
programme.desc: With the help of a guide, Stephanie Izard explores the underground secret pizzas of Los Angeles, including an off-menu pizza at a cinnamon bun pop-up, apartment-cooked limited drop specials and gourmet sourdough pies made in pizza van’s mobile oven.

programme.title: Life After Restaurants
programme.desc: From backyard mariscos to Cantonese remixes of British hand pies to made-to-order slap noodles, Stephanie catches hangs with 3 chefs who left the traditional restaurant scene and found alternative ways to cook for a living and make the food they love

programme.title: Farm Forward Cooking
programme.desc: From a chef creating dishes that combine her Mexican and Indigenous heritage to a pizza pop up that improvs with farmers market ingredients to a backyard-run Indigenous dinner series, Stephanie Izard meets cooks taking their lead from the land.

programme.title: Origins to Originals
programme.desc: From roast chicken to smash burgers to hot sauce, Stephanie Izard meets three different chefs putting their own California-inspired spin on food from their heritage by remixing traditional recipes that center local, fresh ingredients.

programme.title: Unique Eats
programme.desc: From a chef making Italian pasta with Mexican flavors to a groundbreaking functional cocktail bar to a couple that roasts whole goats behind a tire shop, Stephanie Izard finds unique eateries serving up one-of-a-kind food.

programme.title: Family Style
programme.desc: From brothers selling mom’s Syrian food to a Filipino family remixing a classic dessert to a mom and son running an Indian restaurant out of their house, Stephanie meets multi-gen families turning family recipes into smash hit food business.

programme.title: Home Cooking
programme.desc: From a homerun Greek dinner party series to a backyard that’s become a gourmet deli to a Burmese pop up running out of an apartment kitchen, Stephanie Izard meets cooks finding ingenious ways to serve mouth-watering food out of their houses.

programme.title: Fantastic Pastry Presents
programme.desc: Tis the season for gift giving! Mia walks us through her favorite pastry presents to give to loved ones. From classic cookie gift tins to no bake cheesecakes to savory bakes of cheese and crackers. There is something here for everyone on your list.

programme.title: Bakes On A Budget
programme.desc: Money can be tight around the holidays. From the $3 cookies you will have to try to believe, to a show-stopping $25 trifle, Mia has got you covered - just because you’re on a budget doesn’t mean you have to skimp on style or taste!

programme.title: Bakes Around The World
programme.desc: Join Mia on a trip around the world – without leaving the kitchen! From the Japanese Christmas Cake to Jewish Rugelach to German Pfeffernüsse to Mexican Buñuelos. Your taste buds will get a tour with these holiday bakes from around the world.

programme.title: Hack Your Holidays
programme.desc: In this episode, you don’t even need to turn on your oven! From a jaw-dropping cake hack, to fried biscuit donuts, you won’t believe what you can do with pre-made desserts from the supermarket. Mia will show hacks and great tips for any home-baker!

programme.title: Holiday Cookies
programme.desc: Cookies are the number one baked item during the holidays. Mia shows us how to make some new and inspiring recipes; from buttercream stickers to zebra shortbread leading to a final bake that will make any cookie lover do a double take!

programme.title: Bake in the New Year!
programme.desc: Mia is ringing in the new year with these chic bakes. Fortune cookies for luck, a champagne dessert, a gilded, tuxedo inspired cake-over, and a cocktail to keep you awake until midnight. The only thing missing from the celebration is the ball drop!

programme.title: Holiday Party Treats
programme.desc: Host the ultimate holiday party with these sweet and savory recipes for a crowd! Create a spread for all to enjoy. Mia will whip up wintery bark, bake a savory holiday wreath, and design a cupcake tree complete with sugared and piped ornaments.

programme.title: Spooky Halloween Party Bakes
programme.desc: Make your Halloween Party the talk of every boy and ghoul in the neighborhood! Whether its the poisoned apples, the drippy candle cakes, coffin pies or savory treats (or tricks) – these delicious bakes will surely delight and scare.

programme.title: Hair-raising Halloween Cakes
programme.desc: Join Mia if you DARE for these Halloween cakes are sure to SCARE! Blood red velvet cake, marshmallow spiderwebs, bubbling caldrons and a cake that bites back will inspire some serious spooky vibes. Mia will seriously impress and teach you new skills

programme.title: Trick or Treats for Kids
programme.desc: Whether you have kids or are a kid at heart, these whimsical Halloween treats are delicious, easy bakes. From leftover Halloween candy bark to ghosty treats and monster cakes. These recipes are perfect to make with little ones.

programme.desc: Mia is ringing in the new year with these chic bakes. Fortune cookies for luck, a champagne dessert, a gilded, tuxedo inspired cake-over, and a cocktail to keep you awake until midnight. The only thing missing from the celebration is the ball drop!

programme.title: Holiday Party Treats
programme.desc: Host the ultimate holiday party with these sweet and savory recipes for a crowd! Create a spread for all to enjoy. Mia will whip up wintery bark, bake a savory holiday wreath, and design a cupcake tree complete with sugared and piped ornaments.

programme.title: Side Hustles
programme.desc: From a lawyer to an actor to an insurance analyst, Stephanie discovers a world of folks who’ve turned their passion for cooking into side hustle food businesses. From dumplings, sushi and pretzels she explores how they balance their day jobs.

programme.title: Comfort Foods
programme.desc: Latin-inspired ice cream to Caribbean, Channa curry doubles to gourmet, deli sandwiches; Stephanie Izard shows what comfort food means to 3 very different cooks and learns how they turned their childhood memories into thriving food businesses.

programme.title: Cooking with Fire
programme.desc: Stephanie meets 3 cooks who use fire in different ways to create distinct dishes. Using their love of cooking over an open flame; these cooks introduce her to the diverse flavors of Armenia; a classic Italian hero, and infrared grilled Brazilian BBQ

programme.title: Secret Pizza
programme.desc: With the help of a guide, Stephanie Izard explores the underground secret pizzas of Los Angeles, including an off-menu pizza at a cinnamon bun pop-up, apartment-cooked limited drop specials and gourmet sourdough pies made in pizza van’s mobile oven.

programme.title: Life After Restaurants
programme.desc: From backyard mariscos to Cantonese remixes of British hand pies to made-to-order slap noodles, Stephanie catches hangs with 3 chefs who left the traditional restaurant scene and found alternative ways to cook for a living and make the food they love

programme.title: Farm Forward Cooking
programme.desc: From a chef creating dishes that combine her Mexican and Indigenous heritage to a pizza pop up that improvs with farmers market ingredients to a backyard-run Indigenous dinner series, Stephanie Izard meets cooks taking their lead from the land.

programme.title: Origins to Originals
programme.desc: From roast chicken to smash burgers to hot sauce, Stephanie Izard meets three different chefs putting their own California-inspired spin on food from their heritage by remixing traditional recipes that center local, fresh ingredients.

programme.title: Unique Eats
programme.desc: From a chef making Italian pasta with Mexican flavors to a groundbreaking functional cocktail bar to a couple that roasts whole goats behind a tire shop, Stephanie Izard finds unique eateries serving up one-of-a-kind food.

programme.title: Fantastic Pastry Presents
programme.desc: Tis the season for gift giving! Mia walks us through her favorite pastry presents to give to loved ones. From classic cookie gift tins to no bake cheesecakes to savory bakes of cheese and crackers. There is something here for everyone on your list.

programme.title: Bakes On A Budget
programme.desc: Money can be tight around the holidays. From the $3 cookies you will have to try to believe, to a show-stopping $25 trifle, Mia has got you covered - just because you’re on a budget doesn’t mean you have to skimp on style or taste!

programme.title: Bakes Around The World
programme.desc: Join Mia on a trip around the world – without leaving the kitchen! From the Japanese Christmas Cake to Jewish Rugelach to German Pfeffernüsse to Mexican Buñuelos. Your taste buds will get a tour with these holiday bakes from around the world.

programme.title: Hack Your Holidays
programme.desc: In this episode, you don’t even need to turn on your oven! From a jaw-dropping cake hack, to fried biscuit donuts, you won’t believe what you can do with pre-made desserts from the supermarket. Mia will show hacks and great tips for any home-baker!

programme.title: Feast of Killer Crab And Perfect Pork Belly
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde prepares a finger food feast with char grilled chili crab, spiced adobo potatoes, grilled pork belly, And sofrito stuffed branzino all served on a bed of rice over banana leaves. Call your friends - this is a feast that will feed many!

programme.title: Deluxe Dogs with Crusted Corn And Potatoes
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde puts a modern spin on a classic All-American cookout with his loaded hot dogs, spiced smashed potato salad, chorizo And corn nut crusted corn, and bangin’ banana pudding pops. Sparklers out for this spread!

programme.title: Scrumptious Summer Sandwiches
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde channels his inner sandwich lover by making an angry lobster club with pepper aioli and grilled bacon, a lamb birria torta with avocado and ramen consomme, and his an Italian beef combo with chili crisp cheese sauce, and giardiniera.

programme.title: Pizzapalooza
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde is throwin’ down a pizza spread like never before with his Chicago-style tavern pie with sausage And onion, a grilled pizza pocket with pepperoni And cheese, chicken wings a la pizzaiola, and a zesty grilled caesar salad to finish it off.

programme.title: Side Hustles
programme.desc: From a lawyer to an actor to an insurance analyst, Stephanie discovers a world of folks who’ve turned their passion for cooking into side hustle food businesses. From dumplings, sushi and pretzels she explores how they balance their day jobs.

programme.title: Comfort Foods
programme.desc: Latin-inspired ice cream to Caribbean, Channa curry doubles to gourmet, deli sandwiches; Stephanie Izard shows what comfort food means to 3 very different cooks and learns how they turned their childhood memories into thriving food businesses.

programme.title: Cooking with Fire
programme.desc: Stephanie meets 3 cooks who use fire in different ways to create distinct dishes. Using their love of cooking over an open flame; these cooks introduce her to the diverse flavors of Armenia; a classic Italian hero, and infrared grilled Brazilian BBQ

programme.title: Secret Pizza
programme.desc: With the help of a guide, Stephanie Izard explores the underground secret pizzas of Los Angeles, including an off-menu pizza at a cinnamon bun pop-up, apartment-cooked limited drop specials and gourmet sourdough pies made in pizza van’s mobile oven.

programme.title: Life After Restaurants
programme.desc: From backyard mariscos to Cantonese remixes of British hand pies to made-to-order slap noodles, Stephanie catches hangs with 3 chefs who left the traditional restaurant scene and found alternative ways to cook for a living and make the food they love

programme.title: Farm Forward Cooking
programme.desc: From a chef creating dishes that combine her Mexican and Indigenous heritage to a pizza pop up that improvs with farmers market ingredients to a backyard-run Indigenous dinner series, Stephanie Izard meets cooks taking their lead from the land.

programme.title: Origins to Originals
programme.desc: From roast chicken to smash burgers to hot sauce, Stephanie Izard meets three different chefs putting their own California-inspired spin on food from their heritage by remixing traditional recipes that center local, fresh ingredients.

programme.title: Unique Eats
programme.desc: From a chef making Italian pasta with Mexican flavors to a groundbreaking functional cocktail bar to a couple that roasts whole goats behind a tire shop, Stephanie Izard finds unique eateries serving up one-of-a-kind food.

programme.title: Family Style
programme.desc: From brothers selling mom’s Syrian food to a Filipino family remixing a classic dessert to a mom and son running an Indian restaurant out of their house, Stephanie meets multi-gen families turning family recipes into smash hit food business.

programme.title: Home Cooking
programme.desc: From a homerun Greek dinner party series to a backyard that’s become a gourmet deli to a Burmese pop up running out of an apartment kitchen, Stephanie Izard meets cooks finding ingenious ways to serve mouth-watering food out of their houses.

programme.title: Spring Fling
programme.desc: Spring Fling is here, and were going to show you some fantastic recipes to enjoy some well deserved time in the sun. What are we waiting for? Lets check it out!

programme.title: Italian Classics
programme.desc: On this episode, were going to show you some of our favorite Italian classics. Pasta, pizza, and more... you name it, weve got it. So, what are you waiting for? Its time to get cooking!

programme.title: Eating Vegan
programme.desc: On this episode of Tastemades Recipe Rundown, were switching things up and running on pure plant power! Thats right, today were featuring some incredible vegan eats!

programme.title: Garden of Treasure
programme.desc: Buckle up as Darren takes us back on the road in this new season! Join him as he discovers herb gardens filled with treasures across Malaysias farms And markets - and scales the mountains of East Malaysia, searching for the medicinal herbs used by the aboriginal people And local Chinese.

programme.title: Taste Selebriti
programme.desc: A food-travelogue program where 13 local celebrities will return to their hometowns to share traditional cuisines, unique foods and popular dishes in their states.

programme.title: Travel Lawak
programme.desc: Sebuah program travelog yang menampilkan tiga pelawak popular iaitu Syuk, Sharif Zero dan Mamak Puteh di mana mereka akan mengembara ke luar negara dan meneroka sendiri budaya dan tempat-tempat menarik.

programme.title: Semmaiyaana Saapadu
programme.desc: A mom and her daughters modernize traditional cooking with healthier versions of beloved recipes, serving up nostalgia with a nutritious twist.

programme.title: Kak Kek Ke Kelate
programme.desc: Join alter ego Catriona Ross as she uncovers the most popular dishes, iconic locations, hidden gems and, as always, the vibrant people on her travels throughout Kelantan.

programme.title: RASA Anak Emak Anak Bapak
programme.desc: Program masakan ini memerlukan selebriti jemputan membawa ibu atau bapa mereka menjelajah Malaysia bagi merasa sendiri masakan kegemaran ibu bapa masing-masing.
